connector.description:
Allows to get all tweets on particular keywords from Twitter.

It requires tokens that can be obtained by creating an application 
in the Twitter developer portal: https://developer.twitter.com/.

camel.kamelet.twitter-search-source.keyw.name: camel.kamelet.twitter-search-source.keywords
camel.kamelet.twitter-search-source.keyw.description: The keywords to use in the Twitter search (Supports Twitter standard operators) Example: Apache Camel

camel.kamelet.twitter-search-source.apiK.name: camel.kamelet.twitter-search-source.apiKey
camel.kamelet.twitter-search-source.apiK.description: The API Key from the Twitter application in the developer portal

camel.kamelet.twitter-search-source.apiK.name: camel.kamelet.twitter-search-source.apiKeySecret
camel.kamelet.twitter-search-source.apiK.description: The API Key Secret from the Twitter application in the developer portal

camel.kamelet.twitter-search-source.acce.name: camel.kamelet.twitter-search-source.accessToken
camel.kamelet.twitter-search-source.acce.description: The Access Token from the Twitter application in the developer portal

camel.kamelet.twitter-search-source.acce.name: camel.kamelet.twitter-search-source.accessTokenSecret
camel.kamelet.twitter-search-source.acce.description: The Access Token Secret from the Twitter application in the developer portal
